name: Solitaire Easy Game
description:
Easiest solitaire ever! Just drag any card without any color limitation.

Very very mind refreshing game. You will win this solitaire for sure.

You will allow setting your suitable background and card front page. Playing cards are specially designed to get maximum view of card font and symbol. For new players, it also has tutorial/rules screen where he/she can learn about how to play solitaire and win it.

Why use this Solitaire Easy?
+ Very easy to win. It allows moving same color/type card.
+ Classic Solitaire game with specially designed playing cards.
+ Allow changing wall background and playing card front side.
+ It counts a number of moves.
+ It also maintains game duration.
+ It allows Single-Step Undo to reset the last move.
+ On winning, it allows you to share your duration and number of moves to all your friends through almost all social apps.
